RoomItem.Name: Cupboard
RoomItem.LongDescription: A tall wooden cupboard stands in the corner of the room.

Item.Name: Coffee Cup
Item.DescriptionRoom: A Coffee Cup resting on the third shelf.
Item.ExamineInv: A large Coffee cup, perfect size for a tall latte.
Item.ExamineRoom: The tall coffee cup sits atop the third shelf in the cupboard.

Item.Name: Wooden Bowl
Item.DescriptionRoom: A wooden bowl on a shelf.
Item.ExamineInv: A wooden food bowl, the perfect size for breakfast.
